verses.verse: שִׁגָּי֗וֹן <S%H7692><s%> Shiggaion לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> of David אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which שָׁ֥ר <S%H7891><s%> which he sang לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and דִּבְרֵי־ <S%H1697><s%> concerning the words כ֝֗וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> of Cush בֶּן־ יְמִינִֽי׃ <S%H1145><s%> Benjamite יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱ֭לֹהַי <S%H430><s%> my God בְּךָ֣ חָסִ֑יתִי <S%H2620><s%> in thee do I put my trust הוֹשִׁיעֵ֥נִי <S%H3467><s%> save מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all רֹ֝דְפַ֗י <S%H7291><s%> me from all them that persecute וְהַצִּילֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5337><s%> me and deliver

פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> Or יִטְרֹ֣ף <S%H2963><s%> Lest he tear כְּאַרְיֵ֣ה <S%H738><s%> like a lion נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> my soul פֹּ֝רֵ֗ק <S%H6561><s%> rending [it] in pieces וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there מַצִּֽיל׃ <S%H5337><s%> while [there is] none to deliver

יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱ֭לֹהַי <S%H430><s%> my God אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if עָשִׂ֣יתִי <S%H6213><s%> if I have done זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> If יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> this if there be עָ֥וֶל <S%H5766><s%> iniquity בְּכַפָּֽי׃ <S%H3709><s%> in my hands

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If גָּ֭מַלְתִּי <S%H1580><s%> If I have rewarded שֽׁוֹלְמִ֥י <S%H7999><s%> unto him that was at peace רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> evil וָאֲחַלְּצָ֖ה <S%H2502><s%> with me (yea I have delivered צוֹרְרִ֣י <S%H6887><s%> is mine enemy רֵיקָֽם׃ <S%H7387><s%> him that without cause

יִֽרַדֹּ֥ף <S%H7291><s%> persecute אוֹיֵ֨ב ׀ <S%H341><s%> Let the enemy נַפְשִׁ֡י <S%H5315><s%> my soul וְיַשֵּׂ֗ג <S%H5381><s%> and take וְיִרְמֹ֣ס <S%H7429><s%> [it] yea let him tread down לָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth חַיָּ֑י <S%H2416><s%> my life וּכְבוֹדִ֓י ׀ <S%H3519><s%> mine honour לֶעָפָ֖ר <S%H6083><s%> in the dust יַשְׁכֵּ֣ן <S%H7931><s%> and lay סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

ק֘וּמָ֤ה <S%H6965><s%> Arise יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD בְּאַפֶּ֗ךָ <S%H639><s%> in thine anger הִ֭נָּשֵׂא <S%H5375><s%> lift up בְּעַבְר֣וֹת <S%H5678><s%> thyself because of the rage צוֹרְרָ֑י <S%H6887><s%> of mine enemies וְע֥וּרָה <S%H5782><s%> and awake אֵ֝לַ֗י <S%H410><s%> God מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> for me [to] the judgment צִוִּֽיתָ׃ <S%H6680><s%> [that] thou hast commanded

וַעֲדַ֣ת <S%H5712><s%> So shall the congregation לְ֭אֻמִּים <S%H3816><s%> of the people תְּסוֹבְבֶ֑ךָּ <S%H5437><s%> compass thee about וְ֝עָלֶ֗יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and over לַמָּר֥וֹם <S%H4791><s%> thou on high שֽׁוּבָה׃ <S%H7725><s%> for their sakes therefore return

יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD יָדִ֪ין <S%H1777><s%> shall judge עַ֫מִּ֥ים <S%H5971><s%> the people שָׁפְטֵ֥נִי <S%H8199><s%> judge יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> me O LORD כְּצִדְקִ֖י <S%H6664><s%> according to my righteousness וּכְתֻמִּ֣י <S%H8537><s%> and according to mine integrity עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

יִגְמָר־ <S%H1584><s%> come to an end נָ֬א <S%H4994><s%> O רַ֨ע ׀ <S%H7451><s%> Oh let the wickedness רְשָׁעִים֮ <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked וּתְכוֹנֵ֪ן <S%H3559><s%> but establish צַ֫דִּ֥יק <S%H6662><s%> the just וּבֹחֵ֣ן <S%H974><s%> trieth לִ֭בּ֗וֹת <S%H3826><s%> the hearts וּכְלָי֗וֹת <S%H3629><s%> and reins אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> God צַדִּֽיק׃ <S%H6662><s%> for the righteous

מָֽגִנִּ֥י <S%H4043><s%> My defence עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is with אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> [is] of God מ֝וֹשִׁ֗יעַ <S%H3467><s%> which saveth יִשְׁרֵי־ <S%H3477><s%> the upright לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> in heart

אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> God שׁוֹפֵ֣ט <S%H8199><s%> judgeth צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> the righteous וְ֝אֵ֗ל <S%H410><s%> and God זֹעֵ֥ם <S%H2194><s%> is angry בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every יֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> [with the wicked] every day

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יָ֭שׁוּב <S%H7725><s%> If he turn חַרְבּ֣וֹ <S%H2719><s%> his sword יִלְט֑וֹשׁ <S%H3913><s%> not he will whet קַשְׁתּ֥וֹ <S%H7198><s%> his bow דָ֝רַ֗ךְ <S%H1869><s%> he hath bent וַֽיְכוֹנְנֶֽהָ׃ <S%H3559><s%> and made it ready

וְ֭לוֹ הֵכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> He hath also prepared כְּלֵי־ <S%H3627><s%> for him the instruments מָ֑וֶת <S%H4194><s%> of death חִ֝צָּ֗יו <S%H2671><s%> his arrows לְֽדֹלְקִ֥ים <S%H1814><s%> against the persecutors יִפְעָֽל׃ <S%H6466><s%> he ordaineth

הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold יְחַבֶּל־ <S%H2254><s%> Behold he travaileth אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> with iniquity וְהָרָ֥ה <S%H2029><s%> and hath conceived עָ֝מָ֗ל <S%H5999><s%> mischief וְיָ֣לַד <S%H3205><s%> and brought forth שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> falsehood

בּ֣וֹר <S%H953><s%> a pit כָּ֭רָֽה <S%H3738><s%> He made וַֽיַּחְפְּרֵ֑הוּ <S%H2658><s%> and digged וַ֝יִּפֹּ֗ל <S%H5307><s%> it and is fallen בְּשַׁ֣חַת <S%H7845><s%> into the ditch יִפְעָֽל׃ <S%H6466><s%> [which] he made

יָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> shall return עֲמָל֣וֹ <S%H5999><s%> His mischief בְרֹאשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7218><s%> upon his own head וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> upon קָ֝דְקֳד֗וֹ <S%H6936><s%> upon his own pate חֲמָס֥וֹ <S%H2555><s%> and his violent יֵרֵֽד׃ <S%H3381><s%> dealing shall come down

אוֹדֶ֣ה <S%H3034><s%> I will praise יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כְּצִדְק֑וֹ <S%H6664><s%> according to his righteousness וַ֝אֲזַמְּרָ֗ה <S%H2167><s%> and will sing praise שֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> to the name יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H5945><s%> most high
